GK19suvasavu:2: paśyanti sūkṣmamatayaḥ sā jayati sarasvatī devī // SuVas_1 //
GK19suvasavu:3: khinno 'si muñca śailaṃ bibhṛmo vayam iti vadatsu śithilabhujaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:4: bharabhugnavitatabāhuṣu gopeṣu hasan harir jayati // SuVas_2 //
GK19suvasavu:6: rājanti valivibhaṅgāḥ sa pātu dāmodaro bhavataḥ // SuVas_3 //
GK19suvasavu:7: sa jayati himakaralekhā cakāsti yasyotsukomayā nihitā /
GK19suvasavu:11: viṣadharato 'py ativiṣamaḥ khala iti na mṛṣā vadanti vidvāṃsaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:12: yad ayaṃ nakuladveṣī sa kuladveṣī punaḥ piśunaḥ // SuVas_6 //
GK19suvasavu:13: atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānām atīva nipuṇā dhīḥ /
GK19suvasavu:14: timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ // SuVas_7 //
GK19suvasavu:15: hasta iva bhūtimalino laṅghayati yathā yathā khalaḥ sujanam /
GK19suvasavu:16: darpaṇam iva taṃ kurute tathā tathā nirmalacchāyam // SuVas_8 //
GK19suvasavu:18: antaritaśaśirucām api salilamucāṃ malinim ābhyadhikaḥ // SuVas_9 //
GK19suvasavu:19: sā rasavattā nihatā navakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:20: sarasīva kīrtiśeṣaṃ gatavati bhuvi vikramāditye // SuVas_10 //
GK19suvasavu:22: anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā // SuVas_11 //
GK19suvasavu:23: guṇinām api nijarūpapratipattiḥ parata eva saṃbhavati /
GK19suvasavu:24: svamahimadarśanam akṣṇor mukuratale jāyate yasmāt // SuVas_12 //
GK19suvasavu:48: 2) yatra ca śāsati dharaṇimaṇḍalaṃ chalanigrahaprayogā vādeṣu,
GK19suvasavu:64: rāghavaḥ pariharann api janakabhuvaṃ janakabhuvā saha vanaṃ viveśa /
GK19suvasavu:65: bharato 'pi rāmadarśitabhaktir api rājye virāmam akarot /
GK19suvasavu:66: nalasya damayantyā militasyāpi punar bhūparigraho jātaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:71: sarvataḥ kaṭakasaṃcāriṇo gandharvān darśitaśṛṅgonnatiḥ sukhayan na virarāma /
GK19suvasavu:72: sa himālayo nāvaśyāyocchalitaḥ no māyājanmane hitaś ca /
GK19suvasavu:73: asau hi mānī giri sthito vṛṣadhvajaś ca /
GK19suvasavu:94: yasya ca ripuvargaḥ sadā pārtho 'pi na mahābhārataraṇayogyaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:97: api ca sa triśaṅkur iva nakṣatrapathasthalitaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:138: prasannasattvāḥ santaḥ parām ṛddhim avāpuḥ prajālokāḥ /
GK19suvasavu:142: makaraketor iva darśanena vanitājanasya hṛdayam ullalāsa /
GK19suvasavu:165: yasya ca pratāpānaladagdhānāṃ ripusundarīṇāṃ karatalatāḍanabhītair iva muktāhāraiḥ payodharaparisaro muktaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:173: 5) atha sa kadācid avasannāyāṃ yāmavatyāṃ dadhidhavale kālakṣapaṇakapiṇḍa iva niśāyamunāphenastabake,
GK19suvasavu:184: sakalanipītaniśātimirasaṃghātam atitanīyastayā soḍhum asamartheṣv iva kajjalavyājād udvamatsu,
GK19suvasavu:196: vigalitakundair alakaiḥ priyavirahaśokād bāṣpabindūn utsṛjadbhir iva priyatamagamananiṣedham iva kurvatīṣu vācālatulākoṭibhiś caraṇapallavair vilasitāsu,
GK19suvasavu:209: priyavirahitāsu rahitāsu sukhena murmuram iva varṣati samantād arpake darpakeṣu dahanasya,
GK19suvasavu:219: payodharakalaśayoḥ kathaṃ mayy eva pāto bhaviṣyatīti cintayeva,
GK19suvasavu:221: vidhātur atipīḍayato hastaparāmarśajanitaparikleśeneva kṣīṇataratām upagatena madhyabhāgenālaṅkṛtām,
GK19suvasavu:223: atigurupariṇāhatayā patanabhayakhillitābhyām iva cūcukacchalena vidhinā iva kīlitābhyāṃ,
GK19suvasavu:238: taruṇaketakadaladrāghīyasā pakṣmalacaṭulālasena hṛdayāvāsagṛhāvasthitasya hṛcchayavilāsino gavākṣaśaṅkām upajanayatā,
GK19suvasavu:259: śanaiś careṇa pādena saumyena darśanena guruṇā nitambena,
GK19suvasavu:261: grahamayīm iva saṃsārabhitticitralekhām iva trailokyasaundaryasaṅketabhūmim iva rasāñjanasiddhim iva yauvanasya,
GK19suvasavu:274: tribhuvanavilocanamṛṣṭim iva prajāpateḥ kanyakām aṣṭādaśavarṣadeśīyām apaśyat svapne /
GK19suvasavu:275: 6) atha tāṃ prītivistāritena pibann iva cakṣuṣā,
GK19suvasavu:277: vibuddhas tu viṣasarasīva durjanavacasīva nimagnam ātmānam avadhārayituṃ na śaśāka /
GK19suvasavu:278: tathā hi kṣaṇam ākāśatalāliṅganārthaṃ prasāritabāhuyugalaḥ “ehy ehi priyatame,
GK19suvasavu:279: mā gaccha mā gaccheti” dikṣu vidikṣu ca vilikhitām ivotkīrṇām iva cakṣuṣi nikhātām iva hṛdaye priyām ājuhāva /
GK19suvasavu:280: tatas tatraiva śayyātale nilīno niṣiddhāśeṣaparijanadarśano dattakapāṭaḥ parihṛtatāmbūlāhārādisakalopabhogas taṃ divasam anayat /
GK19suvasavu:282: 7) atha tasya priyasakho Makarando nāma katham api labdhapraveśaḥ kandarpasāyakaprahāravivaśaṃ Kandarpaketum uvāca /
GK19suvasavu:285: khalā(ḥ) punas tat tad aniṣṭam anucitam evāvadhārayanti /
GK19suvasavu:291: sarṣapasneha iva karayugalālito 'pi śirasā dhṛto 'pi na kāṭavaṃ jahāti /
GK19suvasavu:294: viṣataruprasava iva yathā yathānubhūyate tathā tathā moham eva draḍhayati /
GK19suvasavu:296: nidāghadivasa iva matsaro vahati saṃtāpaṃ sumanasām /
GK19suvasavu:304: vṛṣabha iva surabhiyānavikalaḥ kāmīva gotraskhalanavidhuro vāmādhvānuraktaś ca /
GK19suvasavu:305: ajīrṇavikāra iva kalevare 'pi vacasi mandimānam āvahati /
GK19suvasavu:306: vañcaka iva raktaḥ kaṭukaphalena vibhāvarīraktaś ca /
GK19suvasavu:309: kuddāla iva dalitagotraḥ kṣamābhājaḥ prāṇino nikṛntati /
GK19suvasavu:311: duṣṭaśūrpaśrutir iva kānanarucir anugatam api yavasaṃ tataṃ nānumodate /
GK19suvasavu:312: abījād eva jāyante 'kāṇḍāt prasaranti khalavyasanāṅkurāḥ durucchedāś ca bhavanti /
GK19suvasavu:313: asatāṃ hṛdi praviṣṭo hi doṣalavaḥ karālāyate,
GK19suvasavu:315: bhūyo yadi katham api viśati tadā pārada iva kṣaṇamātraṃ na tiṣṭhati /
GK19suvasavu:317: sukhaṃ janā hi bhavādṛśāḥ śaratsamayā iva haranti na ca mitrasya sacetanā visadṛśam upadiśanti
GK19suvasavu:319_0: [tathā hi] mādhuryaśaityaśucitvatāpaśāntibhiḥ payaḥ paya iti nimittatām upagatasya
GK19suvasavu:319_1: dugdhasya matsamāgamād vardhitasya kvāthe puro mamaiva kṣayo yukta iti vicintyeva vāriṇāpi kṣīyate /
GK19suvasavu:322: sādhavo hi mohāt param utpathapravṛttā bhavantītyādi” vadati tasmin katham api smaraprahāraparavaśaḥ parimitākṣaram uvāca [Kandarpaketuḥ] /
GK19suvasavu:330: tad adhunā yadi tvaṃ sahapāṃsukṛīḍitasamaduḥkhasukho 'si tadā mām anugacchety” uktvā parijanālakṣitas tena sahaiva purān nirjagāma /
GK19suvasavu:362: pihitāmbaro 'py ullasadaṃśuko Vindhyo nāma mahāgirir adṛśyata /
GK19suvasavu:371: sukumāralalitābhiḥ puṣpitāgrābhiḥ śikhariṇībhiḥ praharṣiṇībhir latābhir darśitānekavṛttavilāsaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:391: dhanakāmayeva kṛtabhūbhṛtsevayā revayā priyatamayeva prasāritavīcihastopagūḍhaḥ / yaś ca
GK19suvasavu:396: daṃṣṭrākoṭivisaṅkaṭāsyakuharaḥ kurvan saṭām utkaṭām utkarṇaḥ kurute kramaṃ karipatau krūrākṛtiḥ kesarī // SuVas_15 //
GK19suvasavu:399: citreṇāpi na śakyate vilikhituṃ sarvāṅgasaṅkocabhāk cītkurvadgirikuñjakuñjaraśiraḥ kumbhasthalastho hariḥ // SuVas_16 //
GK19suvasavu:415: 11) atrāntare bhagavān api marīcimālī ātapaklāntamattamahiṣalocanapāṭalamaṇḍalaś caramācalaśṛṅgam āruroha /
GK19suvasavu:416: 12) tato Makarandaḥ phalamūlāny ādāya katham api tam abhininditāhāraparicayam akārṣīt /
GK19suvasavu:418: atha tām eva priyatamāṃ ḥṛdayaphalake saṃkalpatūlikayā likhitām avalokayan niṣyandakaraṇagrāmaḥ Kandarpaketur Makarandaviracitapallavaśayane suṣvāpa /
GK19suvasavu:419: athārdhayāmamātrakhaṇḍitāyāṃ vibhāvaryāṃ tatra jambūtaruśikhare mithaḥ kalahāyamānayoḥ śukaśārikayoḥ kalakalaṃ śrutvā,
GK19suvasavu:460: andhāsureṇeva śūlānām uparigatena veśyājanenādhiṣṭhitaṃ Kusumapuraṃ nāma nagaram /
GK19suvasavu:479: 15) [yac ca] diśi diśi kusumanikaram iva tārāgaṇam udvahadbhiḥ,
GK19suvasavu:500: kṛṣṇa iva satyabhāmopetaḥ Śṛṅgāraśekharo nāma rājā prativasati /
GK19suvasavu:501: yo balabhit pāvako dharmarāṇ nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ sadāgatir dhanadaḥ śaṅkara ity aṣṭamūrtir apy anaṣṭamūrtiḥ /
GK19suvasavu:502: surāṇāṃ pātāsau sa punar atipuṇyaikahṛdayo grahas tasyāsthāne gururucitamārge sa nirataḥ /
GK19suvasavu:503: karas tasyātyarthaṃ vahati śatakoṭipraṇayitāṃ sa sarvasvaṃ dātā tṛṇam iva sureśaṃ vijayate // SuVas_17 //
GK19suvasavu:504: jīvākṛṣṭiṃ sa cakre mṛdhabhuvi dhanuṣaḥ śatrur āsīd gatāsur lakṣāptir mārgaṇānām abhavad aribale tad yaśas tena labdham /
GK19suvasavu:505: muktā tena kṣameti tvaritam arigaṇair uttamāṅgaiḥ pratīṣṭo pañcatvaṃ dveṣisainye sthitam avanipatir nāpa saṅkhyāntaraṃ saḥ // SuVas_18 //
GK19suvasavu:506: 17) yatra ca rājanīticature caturambudhimekhalāyā bhuvo nāyake śāsati vasumatīṃ pitṛkārye vṛṣotsargaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:539: tayoś ca madhyamopāntavayasi vartamānayoḥ katham api daiva(va)
GK19suvasavu:542: atha sā rāvaṇabhujavana ivollāsitagotreva pariṇāmam upayāty api yauvanabhāve pariṇayaparaṅmukhī tasthau /
GK19suvasavu:563: 20) atidūrapravṛddhena madhunā jagati ko vā na vikriyate yad atimukto 'pi munir api vicakāsa /
GK19suvasavu:565: vṛntanirgatavicakilavivare guñjanmadhukaro makaraketos tribhuvanavijayaśaṅkhadhvanim iva cakāra /
GK19suvasavu:566: navayāvakapaṅkapallavitasanūpurataruṇīcaraṇaprahārānurāgavaśān navakisalayacchalena tam eva rāgam udavahad aśokapādapaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:567: madhuramadhudhvanitakāminīmukhakamalasaṅgānurāgād iva tadrasam ātmakusumeṣu bibhrad bakulatarū rarājata /
GK19suvasavu:570: virahiṇīhṛdayamathanāya kusumaśarasya cakram iva nāgakesarakusumam aśobhata /
GK19suvasavu:571: pathikahṛdayam astyaṃ grahītuṃ makaraketoḥ palāva iva pāṭalipuṣpam adaśyata /
GK19suvasavu:578: 22) atrāntare Vāsavadattāsakhījanād viditābhiprāyaḥ Śṛṅgāraśekharaḥ svasutāsvayaṃvarārtham aśeṣadharaṇitalabhājāṃ bhūbhujāṃ saṅgatam akarot /
GK19suvasavu:583: arjunasamaram iva nandighoṣamukharitadigantaṃ mañcam āruroha Vāsavadattā /
GK19suvasavu:587: itare py āhartum udyatā iva svabalārthinaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:602: kecit kumudākarā ivāsoḍhabhāsaḥ kṣaṇam evaṃ sthitā rājaputrāḥ /
GK19suvasavu:603: sā ca kṣaṇenaikaikaśaḥ samavalokya kumārikā ta(s)
GK19suvasavu:605: 24) atha sā tasyām eva rātrau svapne vālinam ivāṅgadopaśobhitaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:609: kṛṣṇam iva kaṃ saharṣaṃ na kurvantaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:616: godayā bhujayā svarvāhinyā kīrtyā ca puṇyamayam iva,
GK19suvasavu:626: kośam iva mahāsaundaryasya tribhuvanalobhanīyākṛtiṃ yuvānaṃ dadarśa /
GK19suvasavu:627: 25) “sa Cintāmaṇināmno rājñas tanayaḥ Kandarpaketur nāmeti” sā svapna eva nāmādikam aśrauṣīt /
GK19suvasavu:629: manye svasyaiva naipuṇyasya saundaryadarśanotsukamanasā kamalabhuvā jagattrayasamavāye rūpaparamāṇūn ādādya viracito 'yam anyathā katham ayam asya kāntiviśeṣa” iti,
GK19suvasavu:632: aphalam iva duṣyantasya kṛte śakuntalāpi durvāsasaḥ śāpam anubabhūva,
GK19suvasavu:635: viphalam eva dhūmorṇā svayaṃvarārthagatadevagrahagandharvasahasreṣu dharmarājam akāṅkṣateti” bahudhiyā cintayantī virahamurmuramadhyam ārūḍheva vāḍavāgniśikhā[kavaliteva],
GK19suvasavu:661: malayānilāhatajīviteva “priyasakhy Anaṅgalekhe vitara[me] hṛdaye pāṇipādaṃ duḥsaho virahasantāpaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:666: capale Citralekhe likha citre cittacoraṃ janaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:669: sukānte Kāntimati mandaṃ mandam apanaya bāṣpabindūn, yū(thi)
GK19suvasavu:674: kim iti locanamayāni mamāṅgāni vidhinā na kṛtāni,
GK19suvasavu:677: [malayānila] suratotkaṇṭhadīkṣāguro vaha yatheccham” iti bahuvidhaṃ bhāṣamāṇā Vāsavadattā sakhījanena samaṃ mumūrccha /
GK19suvasavu:695: puṇyanāmākṣarāṇi ca tāni sukṛtabhāñji yāny amunā pariṣkṛtānīti muhur muhuḥ paribhāvayantī,
GK19suvasavu:700: puro darśitam ivetas tato vilokayantī vyatiṣṭhata /
GK19suvasavu:701: 27) atha tasyāḥ sārikā Tamālikā nāma tatsakhībhiḥ sahālocya Kandarpaketor bhāvam ākalayituṃ [pra]sthitā /
GK19suvasavu:702: āgatā ca mayaiva sārdham atraiva taror adhas tiṣṭhatīty” uktvā virarāma /
GK19suvasavu:703: 28) atha saharṣam utthāya Makarando viditavṛttāntāṃ Tamālikām akarot /
GK19suvasavu:704: sā ca kṛtapraṇāmā Kandarpaketave patrikām upānayata /
GK19suvasavu:707: svapnānubhūtabhāvā draḍhayati na pratyayaṃ yuvatiḥ // SuVas_19 //
GK19suvasavu:708: 29) tac chrutvā Kandarpaketur amṛtārṇavamagnam iva sarvānandānām upari vartamāno mandaṃ mandam utthāya prasāritabāhuyugalas tām āliliṅga /
GK19suvasavu:711: katham āsta” ityādi sakalaṃ vṛttāntaṃ pṛcchaṃs tāṃ niśāṃ dinam apy ativāhya cacāla Kandarpaketuḥ /
GK19suvasavu:712: atrāntare bhagavān api marīcimālī enaṃ vṛttāntam iva kathayituṃ madhyamaṃ lokam avātarat /
GK19suvasavu:724: durvidha iva parityaktavasuḥ saviṣādaś ca, śā(kya)
GK19suvasavu:739: mukharitadhanuṣi varṣati śaranikaram anavaratam aśeṣasaṃsāraśemuṣīmuṣi makaradhvaje,
GK19suvasavu:749: athānena pravartatā [vartmanā] bhagavatā bhānunā [ā]gantavyam iti sarvapaṭṭamayair vasanair iva maṇikuṭṭimābhir viracitavaruṇena,
GK19suvasavu:758: 32) kṣaṇena ca kṣaṇadārāgaracanācaturāsu sandhyāśiṣyāsv iva veśyāsu tulādhāraśūnyāyāṃ paṇyavīthyām iva divi,
GK19suvasavu:783: bauddhasiddhāntam iva pratyakṣadravyam apahnuvānaṃ timiram ajṛmbhata /
GK19suvasavu:793: tato niśākarārambhasamaya iva saṃkucatkuvalayavyājaviracitāñjalipuṭe namati tamitimire,
GK19suvasavu:798: viśvaṃ gaṇayatovidhātuḥ śaśikamaṭhinīkhaṇḍena tamomaṣīśyāme 'jina iva viyati saṃsārasyātiśūnyatvāc chūnyabindava iva vitatāḥ,
GK19suvasavu:811: ravivirahavidhurāyāḥ kamalinyā hṛdayam iva dvidhā papāṭa cakravākamithunam /
GK19suvasavu:812: āgamiṣyato himakaradayitasya pārśve saṃcarantī kumudinyā bhramaramālā dūtīvālakṣyata /
GK19suvasavu:813: tārakāvyājād astaṅgatasya divākarasya śokād iva kakubho vyarudan /
GK19suvasavu:814: bhāsvato nijadayitasya virahād abhinavakiñjalkarāśivyājena murmura iva nalinīkośahṛdaye jajvāla /
GK19suvasavu:829: acchakuṅkumapiṇḍapūrṇasthita[pātra] iva niśāvilāsinyāḥ kuṅkumāruṇaśveta[stana]kalaśa iva cākhaṇḍalāśāyāḥ,
GK19suvasavu:831: 36) tataḥ kāminīhṛdayasaṅkrāmita iva cakorāṅganānetrapuṭapāṭita iva raktakumudakośakīṭa iva kṣīṇatāṃ jagāma kṣaṇadākṛto rāgaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:857: 38) atrāntare 'bhisārikāsārthapreṣitānāṃ priyatamān prati dūtīnāṃ dvyarthāḥ saprapañcāḥ vikārabhaṅgurāḥ pravādā babhūvuḥ /
GK19suvasavu:863: dhamārthāny aprayuktaḥ kṣepaṇika iva mudhā vāhitataravāris tvam asi /
GK19suvasavu:866: sa khalu vīraḥ pratipakṣasya yaḥ samprahārataḥ kuñjarān nayati /
GK19suvasavu:867: dhṛtorukaravālasañcayo 'pi paramakāṇḍa eva etan mahāpadaṃ vigraheṇa labhate /
GK19suvasavu:868: rājasena rahito rājase na rahito dhruvam /
GK19suvasavu:869: viśāradā viśāradābhraviśadā viśadātmanīnamahimānam ahimānarakṣaṇakṣamā kṣamātilaka te vīratā vīratā manasi bhūtatā bhūtatā vacasi /
GK19suvasavu:870: sāhasena sā hasena kamalā kamalālayā jitā,
GK19suvasavu:871: sā tvadarpaṇā darpaṇākāravimalāśayā śayābjanirjitakisalayā salayāṅgulir iva vibhrameṇa vibhrameṇa gavākṣaśalākāvivaraṃ prati vilokayantī vilokayantī vināśāpam anubhavati duḥkhāni /
GK19suvasavu:872: jīvanāyaka jīvanāya ka iha nāśrayati subhagam /
GK19suvasavu:873: anyās tāvad āsatāṃ dāsatāṃ purato 'ham eva bhajāmi,
GK19suvasavu:875: añjasārataḥ sārataḥ kim api kandarpakaṃ darpakaṃ na tanoṣi viśeṣato 'śeṣataḥ sthitam eva maraṇam /
GK19suvasavu:876: śaṭḥadhiyāṃ śodhana yaśodhana premahāryāmahāryā samotkaṭākṣaiḥ kaṭākṣair āvirbhūtadāsyās tadāsyāḥ parijanāḥ /
GK19suvasavu:878: viśvasya viśvasya vyavasthāṃ samāsādya samāsād yam anekakālaṃ saṅgītasaṅgī tanuṣe 'tanuṣekam anaṅgapuṣpeṣu puṣpeṣurujā tarasā jātarasā mandākṣamandā kṣaṇaṃ bhramantī muhyati /
GK19suvasavu:879_0: kāmadhurādhareṇa kā madhurādhareṇa yuktā rajorājiviśeṣakeṇa saviśeṣakeṇa mukhendunā
GK19suvasavu:879_1: tava hṛdi lagnā mradimākareṇa kareṇa svedabindupayodhareṇa payodhareṇa vakṣaḥphalakāñcanena
GK19suvasavu:880: kāmadāruṇa madāruṇanetrā smaramayaṃ ramayantaṃ tvām adayaṃ madayantī paramakamitāraṃ vāñchati hāriṇā
GK19suvasavu:883: sphaṭikagṛhapraviṣṭam iva śvetadvīpanivāsasukham anubhavad iva jagad āmumude /
GK19suvasavu:886_1: niśāniḥśvāsanibhe nabhasvati Kandarpaketus TamālikāMakarandasahāyo Vāsavadattājanakanagarīm ayāsīt /
GK19suvasavu:887: 40) anantaraṃ kaṭakaikadeśaviracitaikāntanihitamuktāmakarandapadmarāgaśakalena Vāsavadattādarśanārtham āsthitena devatāgaṇeneva jātavalayena parigatam,
GK19suvasavu:888: anilollāsitābhir nabhastarumañjarībhir iva tarjayantībhir iva gaganapuraśriyaṃ patākābhir upaśobhamānaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:897: kācakalaśākṛtim udvahantībhiḥ śikhisaṃhatibhir udbhāsitaiḥ prāsādair upaśobhitaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:908: 41) “dravasi dravasindhuto nigalite capalā capalāyate kim eṣā /
GK19suvasavu:913: Kalike kaliketum imāṃ mukharāṃ muñca mekhalāṃ śṛṇuvaḥ kalavallakīvirutam /
GK19suvasavu:915: tvam eva tv ameva mukharatayā mukharatayā ca /
GK19suvasavu:916: trapate 'tra pated iyam avantisenākusumopahāre mugdhā tava kaitavakairalaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:918: vahatīva hatīr Anaṅgalekhe smarasāyakānāṃ tava vapur alasam /
GK19suvasavu:921: vadane vada netrapeyakāntau kim upamānam indur apy upayāti /
GK19suvasavu:924: Kerali karakākarakālameghakhaṇḍatulām ayam ullasitotphullamallikāmālabhārī [tava yāti] kuntalakalāpaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:928: Murale stanatā stanatāḍaneṣu yat saukhyaṃ labdhaṃ smaratā smaratāpanodanaṃ tad iyaṃ tena viyuktā kiṃ muhyasi /
GK19suvasavu:929: hatamohatamo dayitaḥ smarati sma ratipriyaṃ tava kauśalaṃ /
GK19suvasavu:930: nakharāṇāṃ vraṇaḥ smarajanyāṃ sma rajanyāṃ kurute rujaṃ na te /
GK19suvasavu:931: kiṃ locanābhyāṃ locanābhyāṃ prīṇitākhila janekṣaṇadeśaḥ kṣaṇadeśaḥ kiṃ na pīyate /
GK19suvasavu:932: priyasakhi madanamālini mālini bimbādharasaṅgatyāgecchayā virāmaṃ kuru /
GK19suvasavu:952_0: Pravālike secaya ghusṛṇarasena bālapravālakānanam” ity anyonyapraṇayapeśalāḥ pramadānām
GK19suvasavu:952_1: ālāpakathāḥ śṛṇvan Kandarpaketur Makarandena samaṃ vismayam akaron manasi “aho bhavanānām
GK19suvasavu:955: asāv api karpūraśalākānirmitayantrapañjarasaṃyataḥ krīḍāśuka” ityādi paricintayan praviśya vyākaraṇeneva saraktapādena,
GK19suvasavu:973: 42) atha prītivisphāritena cakṣuṣā pibataḥ Kandarpaketor jahāra cetanāṃ mūrcchāvegaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:976: tato Vāsavadattāyāḥ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī sarvavisrambhapātraṃ Kalāvatī nāma Kandarpaketum uvāca /
GK19suvasavu:979_0: tvatkṛte yānayā vedanānubhūtā sā yadi nabhaḥ patrāyate sāgaro lolāyate brahmā lipikarāyate
GK19suvasavu:979_1: bhujagapatir vākkathakaḥ tadā kim api katham apy ekaikair yugasahasrair abhilikhyate kathyate vā /
GK19suvasavu:982: eṣāsmatsvāmiduhitā prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ pitrā yauvanātikramadoṣaśaṅkinā bhayena vidyādharacakravartino Vijayaketoḥ putrāya Puṣpaketave pāṇigrahaṇāya dātavyā /
GK19suvasavu:983: anayāpy ālocitam adya yadi taṃ janam ādāya nāgacchati Tamālikā,
GK19suvasavu:984: tadāvaśyam eva mayā hutavahe śayitavyam” iti /
GK19suvasavu:985: tad asyāḥ sukṛtavaśena mahābhāgaḥ imāṃ bhūmim anuprāptaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:986: atha Kandarpaketur bhītabhītaḥ sapraṇayam ānandāmṛtasāgaroddāmataraṅgalaharībhir āpluta iva Vāsavadattāyā sahāmantrya Makarandaṃ vārtānveṣaṇāya tatraiva nagare niyujya,
GK19suvasavu:987: bhujageneva sadāgatyabhimukhena Manojavanāmnā turagena tayā saha nagarān niragāt /
GK19suvasavu:1011: kvacid vidhavām iva sindūratilakabhūṣitāṃ pravālābharaṇāṃ ca,
GK19suvasavu:1018: atrāntare bhagavaty api niśā tayor nidrām ādāya jagāma /
GK19suvasavu:1019: 43.2) krameṇa kālakaivartakena tamisrānāyaṃ prakṣipya gaganamahāsarasi sajīvaśapharanikara ivāpahriyamāṇe tārāgaṇe,
GK19suvasavu:1020: raktāṃśuke viṣamaprarūḍhabisalatāśarayantrānugataśatapatrapustakasanāthe makarandabindusandohanirbharapānamattamadhukaramandramuktasvanaiḥ sadvarṇam iva paṭhati vikace kamalākare,
GK19suvasavu:1021: bhikṣukṛṣīvaleneva kālena timirabījeṣv iva madhukareṣu madhurasakardamitakesarapaṅkeṣu ghanaghaṭamānadalapuṭeṣu,
GK19suvasavu:1022: rajomurmurasanāthamadhukarapaṭalānugatoddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkavyājād dhūpam iva bhagavate kiraṇamāline prayacchantyāṃ kamalinyāṃ,
GK19suvasavu:1026: śākhābhya iva kampitābhyo digbhyo vikacaprasūna iva tārāgaṇe indumaṇḍalaphale ca patati,
GK19suvasavu:1027: tārātaṇḍulaśabalaṃ nabho 'ṅgaṇaṃ sphuradaruṇataruṇacūḍācāruvadane vāsarakṛkavākau caritum avatarati,
GK19suvasavu:1028: “matsaṅgatiprasiddho vāruṇīsamāgamād dvijapatir eṣa patiṣyatīti” hasantyām ivākhaṇḍalakakubhi,
GK19suvasavu:1042: dhāturāgāruṇadiggajapādatalānukāriṇi vibhāvarītimirataskare bhagavati bhāskare samudayam ārohati,
GK19suvasavu:1056: uttiṣṭhamānam uṣnam uṣṇaraśmer āśrayati raśmisañcaye Kandarpaketuḥ sarvarātrajāgaraparavaśa āhāraśūnyaśarīratayā niścetanaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:1059_0: 44) tato vaṇijīva prasāritāmbare mahādāvānala iva sakalakāṣṭhādīpini pataṅgamaṇḍale
GK19suvasavu:1059_1: madhyaṃdinam āruḍhe Kandarpaketuḥ priyayā vinā latāgṛham avalokyotthāya tata ito
GK19suvasavu:1071: kiṃ mayā na kṛtam avadātaṃ karma /
GK19suvasavu:1084: kiṃ na kṛtaḥ śaraṇecchurabhaya” iti bahuvidhaṃ vilapan dakṣiṇena kānanaṃ nirgatya navyanalanaladanalinīniculapiculaviḍudabahulena,
GK19suvasavu:1115: vāruṇīvijayapatākābhir iva śeṣakulanirmokamañjarībhir iva śaśāṅkapariśeṣaparamāṇusantatibhir iva phenarājibhir upāntarāmaṇīyakaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:1116: aparam iva gaganaṃ avanītalam avatīrṇam acchārṇavacchalād ucchalacchīkarakaṇanikaranibhena nabhaścarān muktāphalair iva vilobhayantam,
GK19suvasavu:1148: 46) acintayac ca “aho me kṛtāpakāreṇāpi vidhinopakṛtir eva kṛtā yad ayaṃ locanagocaratāṃ nītaḥ samudraḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1149: tad atra deham utsṛjya priyāvirahāgniṃ nirvāpayāmi /
GK19suvasavu:1150: yady apy anāturasyātmatyāgo na vihitas tathāpi kāryaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1151: na khalu sarvaḥ sarvaṃ kāryam akāryaṃ vā karoti /
GK19suvasavu:1152: asāre saṃsāre kena kiṃ nāma na kṛtam /
GK19suvasavu:1185: 47) tataḥ kṛtasnānādir jalam avataritum ārebhe śarīratyāgāya /
GK19suvasavu:1194: “ārya Kandarpaketo punar api tava priyayā saṃgamo bhaviṣyatīty acireṇa /
GK19suvasavu:1197: punaḥ priyayā samāgamāśayā saṃsthitihetubhūtam aśanaṃ cikīrṣuḥ kacchopāntabhuvaṃ jagāma /
GK19suvasavu:1198: tatra tata itaḥ paribhraman phalamūlādinā vane vartayan kālaṃ nināya /
GK19suvasavu:1199: 49) ekadā tu katipayamāsāpagame kākalīgāyana iva samṛddhanimnagānadaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:1210: pravasatānidāghena divaḥpayodhare smaraṇāya kṣatā nakhapadāvalir iva,
GK19suvasavu:1215: 51) ativeganipītajaladhiśaṅkhamālām iva balākācchalād udvamann ivādṛśyata jaladharanikaraḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1216: āpītaharitaiḥ kṛṣṇāsu kedārikākoṣṭhikāsu samutphaladbhir jātuśabalair iva dardurair vidyutā samaṃ cikrīḍa varṣākālaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1217: ravidīpakajjalanicayanikaṣopala iva meghe samayasuvarṇakāranikaṣitasuvarṇalekheva taḍid aśobhata /
GK19suvasavu:1218: virahiṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ vidārayituṃ karapatram iva kusumāyudhasya krakacacchadam aśobhata /
GK19suvasavu:1219: jaladadāruṇi lolataḍillatāpatranipātavidārite vegadhūtāś cūrṇacayā iva jalareṇavo babhuḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1220: vicchinnadigvadhūhāramukta iva kharapavanavegabhramitaghanagharaghaṭṭanasañcūrṇitās tārānikarā iva bhuvanavijigīṣor makaradhvajasya prasthānalājāñjalaya iva karakā vyarājanta /
GK19suvasavu:1254: vikasvarasare śaratsamayārambhe Kandarpaketuḥ paribhraman śilāmayīṃ putrikāṃ kautukena,
GK19suvasavu:1258: 53) anantaraṃ spṛṣṭamātrā sā śilāmayīṃ mūrtim utsṛjya,
GK19suvasavu:1260: tām avalokya Kandarpaketur amṛtārṇavamagna iva suciram āliṅgya papraccha /
GK19suvasavu:1262: 54) sā tu dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya kathayitum ārebhe /
GK19suvasavu:1263: “āryaputrāpuṇyāyā mama mandabhāginyāḥ “kṛte mahābhāga ujjhitarājya” iti ekākī jana iva vāṅmanasayor agocaraṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān /
GK19suvasavu:1264: anekadivasān āhāraśūnyatayā kṛśataro nidrānte yadi kadācit phalamūlādikaṃ milati,
GK19suvasavu:1265: tadā śarīrasthitiṃ karotīti vicintya phalānveṣaṇāyopavanatarūn avalokayantī katipayanalvagocaram agaccham /
GK19suvasavu:1276: “kim ayaṃ mamānveṣaṇāya tātasya vyūha āhosvid āryaputrasya vāhinīsambhāra” iti cintayantyāṃ mayi paricārakakathitodanto mām uddiśya senāpatir dhāvitaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1277: tato 'nantaraṃ kirātasainyasenāpatis tādṛśa eva senāsamanvito mṛgayāvyājenāgataḥ so 'pi dāvitaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1279: “yady aham āryaputrāya kathayāmi tadaikāky ebhir avaśyam eva hantavyaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1280: atha na kathayāmi tadāham evaibhir hantavyeti” cintākṣaṇa eva dvayoḥ sainyayor yuddham abhūd ekāmiṣābhiyuktayor gṛdhrayor iva /
GK19suvasavu:1289: sṛgālīprārthanīyeṣv āmiṣapiṇḍeṣv iva vatsadantakṣateṣu tṛṇeṣv iva,
GK19suvasavu:1290: jihmagadaṣṭeṣv iva śarīreṣv anāsthāṃ kalayantaḥ samaṃ dviṣāṃ dhanuṣāṃ ca jīvākarṣaṇaṃ cakruḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1291: 57) tyāgina iva dānavanto mārgaṇasantāpam asahantaḥ mahāmṛgā utkupitā iva kṣamāṃ muñcantas turagā rejuḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1294: mūrdhnā cāsthāne praṇamatā “tyakto 'ham” iti harṣād eva nanarta ciraṃ kabandhaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:1295: 58) tataḥ parihāseneva cakṣuṣī pidadhatā parāpavādaśravaṇāruṇeva śrotravṛttiṃ sthagayatā,
GK19suvasavu:1303: tatra samarasambhāre kaścid āśaṅkitorubhaṅgaḥ suyodhana iva yodhaḥ payasi viveśa /
GK19suvasavu:1304: kaścic charatalpaśayo bhīṣma iva cirāya śvasann āsīt /
GK19suvasavu:1305: kaścit karṇa iva viklavībhūtasarvāṅgaḥ śaktimokṣaṇam akarot /
GK19suvasavu:1306: tato vidhvastadhvajapaṭaṃ patatpatākaṃ cyutacāpacāmarāpīḍaṃ skhalatkhaḍgadhenukaṃ tatsamastasainyam anyonyaṃ nidhanam avāpa /
GK19suvasavu:1307: 59) anantaraṃ yasyāśramas tena muninā puṣpādikam ādāyāgatena pratipannasarvavṛttāntena “mamāyam āśramo bhagna iti śilāmayī bhaveti” śaptāham /
GK19suvasavu:1308: anantaraṃ “varākī bahuduḥkham anubhavatīti” karuṇayāryaputrasya sparśāvadhi śāpāntam akarot /“
GK19suvasavu:1309: 60) tataḥ Kandarpaketuḥ samāgatena Makarandena Vāsavadattayā saha svapuraṃ gatvā hṛdayābhilaṣitāni tāni tāni suratasukhāny anubhavan kālaṃ nināya //
GK19suvasavu:1310: iti mahākavi-Subandhu-viracitā Vāsavadattā nāma kathā samāptā /
